channel.title: NPR Programs: All Things Considered
channel.description: All Things Considered hosts Ailsa Chang, Mary Louise Kelly, Juana Summers and Scott Detrow present the program's trademark mix of news, interviews, commentaries, reviews, and offbeat features 7 days a week.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Meta beats FTC case, won't have to spin off WhatsApp, Instagram
item.description: A federal judge ruled against the Federal Trade Commission's antitrust suit alleging that Meta had stifled competition by buying up its rivals.
item.content:encoded: A federal judge ruled against the Federal Trade Commission's antitrust suit alleging that Meta had stifled competition by buying up its rivals.
item.dc:creator: Bobby Allyn

item.title: Texas court blocks Trump-backed redistricting plan
item.description: A federal court has blocked the Republican-led redistricting of the congressional map in Texas, dealing a blow to President Trump's effort to shape the landscape for next year's midterm elections.
item.content:encoded: A federal court has blocked the Republican-led redistricting of the congressional map in Texas, dealing a blow to President Trump's effort to shape the landscape for next year's midterm elections.
item.dc:creator: Blaise Gainey

item.title: Venezuela's president says he's ready for direct talks with Washington
item.description: Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro has offered talks with Washington as President Trump refuses to rule out sending troops into the country, raising tensions across the region.
item.content:encoded: Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro has offered talks with Washington as President Trump refuses to rule out sending troops into the country, raising tensions across the region.
item.dc:creator: Carrie Kahn

item.title: A bee named Lucifer
item.description: A scientist in Australia discovered a new species of native bee, which she named Lucifer because it has horns. Many things are unknown about native bees, and it's unclear what purpose the horns serve.
item.content:encoded: A scientist in Australia discovered a new species of native bee, which she named Lucifer because it has horns. Many things are unknown about native bees, and it's unclear what purpose the horns serve.
item.dc:creator: Katia Riddle

item.title: What does it take to work in the same job for decades?
item.description: NPR's Juana Summers speaks with Wall Street Journal reporter Chip Cutter, who recently spoke with a bunch of the longest-tenured employees at a range of companies, all in different fields.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Juana Summers speaks with Wall Street Journal reporter Chip Cutter, who recently spoke with a bunch of the longest-tenured employees at a range of companies, all in different fields.
item.dc:creator: Daniel Ofman

item.title: Video evidence suggests LSU's Kyren Lacy may not have been involved in deadly crash
item.description: Louisiana state police are under scrutiny in light of new evidence in the case of a Black LSU football star who died by suicide after being charged with negligent homicide in a deadly accident.
item.content:encoded: Louisiana state police are under scrutiny in light of new evidence in the case of a Black LSU football star who died by suicide after being charged with negligent homicide in a deadly accident.
item.dc:creator: Mel Bridges

item.title: These sea turtles in India have rebounded after years of patchwork efforts
item.description: Olive ridley turtle populations appear to have rebounded in India after years of patchwork efforts to stem their decline. Can it last?
item.content:encoded: Olive ridley turtle populations appear to have rebounded in India after years of patchwork efforts to stem their decline. Can it last?
item.dc:creator: Diaa Hadid

item.title: Is the future of trucking a better truck?
item.description: Technology can make big rigs more comfortable and easier to drive. But will new tech improve drivers' jobs, or eliminate them?
item.content:encoded: Technology can make big rigs more comfortable and easier to drive. But will new tech improve drivers' jobs, or eliminate them?
item.dc:creator: Camila Domonoske

item.title: Warner Bros. Discovery is up for sale as theaters hope for a renewed focus on films
item.description: Warner Brothers Discovery is accepting bids this week, sparking concerns among theater owners who hope the potential buyer will prioritize making movies for cinemas.
item.content:encoded: Warner Brothers Discovery is accepting bids this week, sparking concerns among theater owners who hope the potential buyer will prioritize making movies for cinemas.
item.dc:creator: Mandalit del Barco

item.title: House and Senate approve legislation to release Epstein files
item.description: The House and Senate voted overwhelmingly to approve a bill that would compel the Department of Justice to release files related to convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.
item.content:encoded: The House and Senate voted overwhelmingly to approve a bill that would compel the Department of Justice to release files related to convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.
item.dc:creator: Claudia Grisales
